about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME
You are new in town and want to build a new life with your own house, garden and ... and then that!
Uncover the islands' dark secrets as you dig deeper into the villages in search of what planet earth is perishing for.

-HOME- Survival is a blend of peaceful building, farming and crafting, mixed with intense combat and exploration.

CURRENT FEATURE

- Single player PvE Sandbox
- Dynamic weather and Day-Night cycle
- Crafting
- Ai (Bandit, Infected and Animals )
- Character Survival Status Mechanics (Sickness, wound)
- Equipment and clothing system
- World explore (forest, village, military camp, small town, hidden area)
- Swimming
- Multiplayer
- Time Mechanics
- Camp and house defense
- Base Building

DEVELOPMENT ROADMAP

- Manage performance and optimize the game for the better in the EA Version
- Fixing bugs in the game will still be tested in many parts, of course, there must have many bugs followed.
- Add more animals
- Main story and storytelling
- More components to create in workbenches
- Improved User Interface

content_descriptors.notes:
Explicit Violence
Shock and/or Horror Content
scantily clad zombies

detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME
You are new in town and want to build a new life with your own house, garden and ... and then that!
Uncover the islands' dark secrets as you dig deeper into the villages in search of what planet earth is perishing for.

-HOME- Survival is a blend of peaceful building, farming and crafting, mixed with intense combat and exploration.

CURRENT FEATURE

- Single player PvE Sandbox
- Dynamic weather and Day-Night cycle
- Crafting
- Ai (Bandit, Infected and Animals )
- Character Survival Status Mechanics (Sickness, wound)
- Equipment and clothing system
- World explore (forest, village, military camp, small town, hidden area)
- Swimming
- Multiplayer
- Time Mechanics
- Camp and house defense
- Base Building

DEVELOPMENT ROADMAP

- Manage performance and optimize the game for the better in the EA Version
- Fixing bugs in the game will still be tested in many parts, of course, there must have many bugs followed.
- Add more animals
- Main story and storytelling
- More components to create in workbenches
- Improved User Interface

name: -HOME- Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 36 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

short_description: -HOME- Survival is an open-world game that is a unique combination of first and thirt person shooter, survival, crafting, and role-playing games. Experience your own path. Whether it's building the home of your dreams, tending to your crops and watching the sun go down...
supported_languages:
German*, English*, French, Italian, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Czech
*languages with full audio support
